description: A start flow created along with the agent

text: Hi there! üëã  I'm the COVID-19 Healthcare virtual agent. I can help you find resources and provide answers to your COVID-19 questions. Here are some of the things I can help with:

Welcome to our COVID-19 self-assessment tool. 

‚ùóIf you are experiencing a life-threatening emergency, such as severe shortness of breath or high fever, call 911.

‚ùóThis tool is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult a medical professional for serious symptoms or emergencies.

‚ùóAll information provided is safe and anonymous.

‚ùóIf you are experiencing symptoms of COVID-19, such as fever, cough, or shortness of breath, please contact your healthcare provider or telehealth program to discuss whether you should be evaluated for testing.

‚ùóEach coronavirus test provider will determine if testing is appropriate based on your symptoms, risk factors, and test availability.

‚ùóDue to an increase in demand, there may be longer than usual wait times for testing and results in certain areas.

I can help find a location near you, then call or visit their website to make an appointment.

‚ùóYou can get vaccinated with one of 3 brands: Pfizer, Moderna, and Johnson & Johnson (Janssen). Check availability when booking.

‚ùóIf you are under 18, Pfizer is the only vaccine type approved for you.

‚ùóIf you get either the Pfizer or the Moderna vaccine, you must get 2 doses to be fully vaccinated. If you get the Johnson & Johnson (Janssen) vaccine, you only need a single dose. 

‚ùóAll vaccine types are tested, safe, and highly effective.

‚ùóSupplemental doses - If you got the Johnson and Johnson vaccine, you are fully vaccinated. SFDPH does not recommend a supplemental dose.

transitionRoutes.targetFlow: Find COVID-19 Vaccine Access Points Flow

text: ‚ùóGet vaccinated. Stay home if sick. Maximize fresh air. Stay vigilant, maintain social distance, and wear a mask. CDC guidance strongly recommends getting vaccinated.

text:
Good bye!

[Chat ended - Please refresh the page to start a new session]

I am here to help you find vaccine access points or coronavirus testing centers, do a COVID-19 Symptoms assessment and get a digital clearance pass. You can also say Show Main menu. 

How may I help you today?

Apologies, I was not able to understand that. I am here to help you with health screening assessment, clearance pass for entry into an office, finding nearby COVID-19 vaccine, and coronavirus testing locations. 

How can I assist you today?

Apologies, I am here to answer your questions about COVID-19 related healthcare - issue a clearance pass required for entry into the company's office(s), Symptoms assessment tool,  finding nearby COVID-19 vaccine, and coronavirus testing locations.

How can I assist you today?
